name: Asteroids:Crazy Bob
description:
Meet "Asteroids:Crazy Bob" - our top down space shooter!

- Descent storyline with more than 60 levels of arcade shooting.
- Dynamic gameplay, high-density of in-game events.
- Changeable equipment, random engine and weapon malfunction, environmental objects, additional missions, battle tactics, bosses etc.
- Interactive NPCs with avatars and emoji
- Crazy humor and parody in dialogs, lots of easter eggs.
- Transcript text to speech for some sporadial in-game events
- Highly moddable (per xml)

To try out our game just unpack the archive desired location and launch "asteroids_cb.exe"

We would like to have all the feedback you would want to share with us
